name: Innermedia
description:
Founded in 2000, Innermedia have over a decades experience in planning, producing and promoting websites. Previously based in North London, we are a growing agency now homed in Hertfordshire. Â We believe in working closely with all our clients to implement worthwhile effective online offerings that will not only improve a business's online presence but also their overall profitability. We design and building unique, high quality websites that are tailored to your target audience.
All of our websites are built with the user in mind, ensuring that all our sites are informative and easy to use. We also help our clients position themselves highly in search engine's through SEO and PPC campaigns.
